scripts.generate-contract-clients: ./target/bin/soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_crowdfund_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/crowdfund_id) --output-dir ./target/js-clients/crowdfund-contract --network futurenet --contract-name crowdfund-contract && ./target/bin/soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_token_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/token_id) --output-dir ./target/js-clients/ft-contract --network futurenet --contract-name ft-contract
